content.prompt: Dr. Ramsey is studying the effectiveness of different operant conditioning methods to encourage studying behavior in students. The data are presented in the graph. According to the data, which of the following is true of motivating students to study more?

choices.label: Positive reinforcement is the most successful.
Negative reinforcement is the most successful.
Positive punishment is the most successful.
Negative punishment is the most successful.
